What is the name of the swiftest land animal living exclusively on the grasslands of Africa, known for its unique hunting method of suffocating its prey by biting its neck? Also, can you provide some insights into the behavioral patterns of this animal that contribute to its success in the wild?
In terms of Swift code, how would you implement a function that calculates the average speed of a cheetah given its distance travelled and the time it took to cover that distance?
